row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANSIBLE.PUB.JOB.PREPARE_HOSTS_FILE@UNIX
row.description: Prepares hosts information for ansible to connect

row.process:
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hosts Information" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPADDRESS_LIST#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION !:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_ANSIBLE.PUB.STORE.ANSIBLE_FILES", "APACHE_YML",T
:SET &UC4RB_APACHE_YML#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#,"apache.yml")
:SET &AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#)
:SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, "[defaults]") :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, "hostfile = hosts") :SET &RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,"&AGENT_TEMP_DIR#ansible.cfg", "&AGENT#", "&LOGIN#", OVERWRITE) :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, "[apache]") :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_IPADDRESS_LIST#) :SET &RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,"&AGENT_TEMP_DIR#hosts", "&AGENT#", "&LOGIN#", OVERWRITE) :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
cd &AGENT_TEMP_DIR# cp &UC4RB_APACHE_YML# . chmod -x hosts
:PSET &UC4RB_ANSIBLE_APACHEYML# = &AGENT_TEMP_DIR#apache.yml :PSET &UC4RB_ANSIBLE_ANSIBLECFG# = &AGENT_TEMP_DIR#ansible.cfg :PSET &UC4RB_ANSIBLE_APACHEHOSTS# = &AGENT_TEMP_DIR#hosts
execcode=$?
! if [ $execcode -eq 0 ] ! then ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! else ! : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR ! fi if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then exit $execcode fi
